title: Swing Set With Risk Controls
purpose: Swing entries with trend confirmation and ATR‑based risk controls.
rationale: Use MACD and EMA for direction, bands for context, and ATR for stops/targets.

reading_guide.signal_logic: macd up AND close>ema50; use ATR multiples for brackets

beginner_summary: Swing entries with trend confirmation and ATR-based stops/targets.
assistant_hints: Trade in direction of EMA/MACD; skip counter‑trend swings.
Avoid entries at band extremes without confirmation.
Check higher timeframe context before sizing up.
